text: (ai nabee) ve log jo tumase baiat karate hai ve to vaastav mein allaah hee se baiat karate hai. unake haathon ke oopar allaah ka haath hota hai. phir jis kisee ne vachan bhang kiya to vah vachan bhang karake usaka bavaal apane hee sir leta hai, kintu jisane us pratigya ko poora kiya jo usane allaah se kee hai to use vah bada badala pradaan karega
